title: arcade icon bug
body: when i completed the mission for the first arcade icon i completed it but i didnt get the fucking icon. RIOT FUCKING GIVE ME IT

replies.body: I went ahead and checked your account, and it looks like that icon finally made it's way onto your profile. If you still don't have it, feel free to equip any of the old Arcade Icons, as they will let you progress through those missions too.
same thing happening to me i wonder whats going on
